title: WHO Monica Data
description:
Description
The monica data frame has 6357 rows and 12 columns. The
dataset mifem (1295 rows) is the subset that has data
for females.
reference:
Newcastle (Australia) centre of the Monica
project; see the web site http://www.ktl.fi/monica

parameters.outcome:
mortality outcome, a factor with levels live, 
dead
parameters.stroke:
a factor with levels
y, n, nk not known
parameters.highbp:
high blood pressure, a factor with levels
y, n, nk not known
parameters.angina:
a factor with levels y,
n, nk not known
parameters.premi:
previous myocardial infarction event, a 
factor with levels y, n, nk not known
parameters.smstat:
smoking status, a factor with levels c 
current, x ex-smoker, n non-smoker, nk not known
parameters.diabetes:
a factor with levels y, n, nk not 
known
parameters.hichol:
high cholesterol, a factor with levels
y, n nk not known
